name: Revealing Light
book: Pathfinder Player Companion: Monster Hunter's Handbook © 2017, Paizo Publishing, LLC
components: V, S, M/DF (piece of a mirror)
text: The touched object emits a shimmering light (as per light) that causes shadows to shift constantly in a 20-foot radius. Creatures lose any racial bonus on Stealth checks while in the area, and the light suppresses any bonuses on Stealth checks granted by visual camouflage (such as from camouflage netting or the camouflage rogue talent). The unpredictable light patterns also interfere with spells and effects of the pattern subschool, granting all creatures in the area a +2 bonus on saves against such effects.
components_zh: 语言、材料/法器 (一面镜子)
text_zh: 被碰触的物体放射出一阵闪烁的光芒(按照光亮术(light))，使半径20呎内的影子不断的闪动。生物在此区域时，隐匿技能会丧失所有种族加值，同时，这光也会压制任何因视觉伪装给予隐匿的加值(像是伪装网(camouflage netting)UE或是盗贼天赋：伪装(camouflage))。这道变幻莫测的光也会妨碍心灵幻觉子学派相关之法术与效果，给予此区域内的生物在对抗这些效果的豁免检定上+2加值。
